Text:
You may or may not like the music, but this is a collector's item. It will be of particular interest to anyone interested in the Cornish folk scene.
'John the Fish' a.k.a P. 'John Langford' (or vice versa), made 3 vinyl LPs. He often used to sing with the late Brenda Wootton, but you'll find much more about him on his web site.
